website_summaries.verdict: An extremely affordable matte foundation that offers many different shade options.
pros: Light finish that can build to medium coverage
Blends easily and doesn't settle into fine lines
cons: Not ideal for dry skin due to its matte finish

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about three years now and wouldn't ever change. I am 65 and it doesn't settle in wrinkles and it has great coverage... not too heavy and not too light. Including a pic to show results.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! 🌻
customer_reviews.text: This a great foundation, affordable and great coverage. Very light to wear and long lasting. It is also very gently on the skin, it doesn't irritate pores and acne. I really recommend this foundation to those who want a cheaper foundation with excellent quality. :) This is my picture wearing this layer of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rie Del Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype
customer_reviews.text: Foundation is more of a sheer coverage not full coverage. It will make any skin dryness or flakiness much more noticeable. It doesn't cover the lightest blemishes. Redness still visible under foundation. Foundation oxidizes so be weary. Color: 228 Soft Tan is in the NC40 range. Application is patchy and streaky, so would recommend a makeup sponge over a makeup brush. The only attraction to this foundation is its price. You could possibly make this foundation work for you with the right skin care, face primer and setting spray is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Smoon

customer_reviews.title: Good makeup
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup feels very light but has good coverage. Not cakey.
customer_reviews.author: missens

customer_reviews.title: I'm FLAWLESS Shawty!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like I have naturally flawless skin. Great coverage.. My face doesn't feel dry.. Matched perfectly. I chose the shade chestnut. Only thing I didn't like is that it has no pump. I took the top off. My empty, pricey foundation bottle, and poured it in there in order to pump. A little goes a long way. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christie H.

customer_reviews.title: my perfect shade
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know Maybelline released more shades! I use to use this shade in 128 but it was a tad bit too dark, I always had to mix a lighter foundation to get a perfect match until I found this shade (118) and it is the perfect Light- yellow tone and it doesn't oxidize orange on me. For reference I am Asian- yellow, warm undertone. Other foundations I am in L'Oréal true match w3, L'Oréal pro glow 203, L'Oréal infallible 425 Linen, Fenty Beauty foundation 190, Maybelline super stay 24hr 118 Light beige.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  match
customer_reviews.text: I wear 125- nude beige. It’s the closest match I’ve found of any foundation (and I’ve tried them all!) combine that with the price and I don’t know why you would buy anything else. Full disclosure: I prefer a little more full coverage than this foundation provides, so I do start with a BB cream.
customer_reviews.author: A.W. Durango

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Affordable Foundation!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this foundation for a little over a year now and I absolutely love it. It provides a natural, full coverage and you only need to apply a small amount. I have oily, sensitive skin and this has never caused me to breakout even if I leave it on for an evening workout session. Golden Caramel is my favorite shade for my olive/tan skin tone and doesn't leave me looking too orange. I have only used a Beauty Blender to apply it with and I've had no problems. IT IS A SILICONE BASED FOUNDATION so make sure you use a silicone primer too!
customer_reviews.author: TristinTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product 👍💫
customer_reviews.text: I love Mabelline fit me, it's one of my favorite products and it has always impressed me. Will buy again and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ramesh McMiller

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes.
customer_reviews.text: As a darskin woman this is the perfect drugstore foundation. Matches my skin tone, has full coverage and looks natural. Maybelline snapped on this formula yesss boo!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Yemojá

customer_reviews.title: I honestly love this makeup
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love this makeup, was a bit skeptical knowing i have never bought makeup online but I didn't regret it. Bought a darker shade for the summer and will definitely buy the lighter one for when the summer is gone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Not worth :/
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product but I couldn’t no matter how much I tried. I normally buy more expensive foundations but I’m moving soon and needed to save money and heard good things about this. At first it seems like my color right? Wrong, throughout the day it starts to look patchy and oxidizes and makes me look like an Oompa Loompa. Besides looking like a Cheeto everyday, every single day it gave me the worst makeup day ever. ALSO, it made my pores look very clogged and noticeable which I never have much of a problem with and always breaks me out. I have never hated a foundation more in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: My ABSOLUTE FAVORITE! Great/ Medium coverage. NATURAL/FLAWLESS LOOKING
customer_reviews.text: I will never stop buying! My absolute fav! Natural, youthful looking. Does not look too thick or caked on! For best results, APPLY WITH BRUSH! It is buildable for more coverage. Looks so natural. I get compliments all the time! Very affordable, yet luxurious! Best price foundation for the great quality! Get it now & share your results with me : ) SHOP HERE:
customer_reviews.author: One Love

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my skin!! Iam done looking for foundations!! This is amazingly light weight, the coverage is great and it has low transfer.
customer_reviews.author: Nae

customer_reviews.title: Not the real product in it.
customer_reviews.text: I think I got a bad batch. I don’t think it’s real what’s inside. It doesn’t cover, very watery. When it arrived, it was opened (untwisted a bit) and portion looked missing. See the pics I took when it arrived). Either someone used, watered down and returned. Or this is a bad batch. I might try the real product, but this isn’t the real makeup that I received. I’m really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Great for combination skin oily to dry.
customer_reviews.text: emoji covering the background lol. Great buy though! I typically use rihanna’s fenty beauty foundation but decided to purchase this as it was a great amazon deal and i heard nothing but great things about it. I was skeptical at first as I prefer high end over drug store but!!!! This foundation is amazing! I have combination skin btwn oily and dry more oily and i must say it went on flawless!! Stood on all day at that! I set it with my sacha beauty setting powder and the photo finish with flash and everything was just flawless!!!! Great buy for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Lomax

customer_reviews.title: Ladies this is the real deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Im have worn mac and estee launder for 10 years.. I am one who have oily skin. But today let me tell y'all this foundation is the bomb. This make up held up & didn't move on my oily skin. I have never thought that this foundation for the price looks & feels so good on my skin. It is not at all heavy on my skin, I'm amazed.. In mac foundation I am a nc 50 , and estee lauder im a 6n2..truffle.. For this foundation im a cappuccino and I love it..
customer_reviews.author: MONET P.

customer_reviews.title: One of Few Truly Pale Drugstore Foundations BUT...
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult to find a relatively inexpensive foundation that matches my pale complexion.The closest matte comparison is from Kat Von D's line. While this does not fight oil very well, with regular powdering and a primer, it's a solid foundation. I have found it best applies to my skin with my Real Techniques sponge rather than a damp or dry buffing brush. Helps cut down on any undesirable texture. Admittedly, it is not perfect in that it is still a shade too warm for my skintone. Attached is a photo on my inner arm, which is slightly darker than my face. Even fully blended out it is still too yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: As good as department store brands.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is great! I’ve used expensive ($30 range) foundation and I see no difference. I have super oily skin. While I don’t stay oil free all day, it does cover my red spots and blends well into my natural skin color.
customer_reviews.author: nwilkaz

customer_reviews.title: Picture is of second purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand of foundation for years. I gave it three stars because it came mailed in a large box with other stuff and since the lid wasn't screwed all the way on, it got on everything...EVERYTHING! So I pretty much bought half a bottle and a mess. I'll use what is left. Update: I decieded to purchase in the pouch the second time around. Sometimes i shop on Amazon carelessly and purchased from this same seller. It came in nicely. Smaller than i guess i imagined. Cost $2 more for 0.3 oz than the glass bottle.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: NOT SEALED MEGA GROSS!
customer_reviews.text: NOT FACTORY SEALED! I've purchased this product multiple times at the store so I know it comes factory sealed. How can you send people items that aren't sealed that's disgusting and unsafe. Where is the health concern? That's honestly really gross How can you expect people to put products on their skin and face of all places not knowing if someone else stuck thier dirty fingers in here or used makeup brushes ect in the bottle. Suprised not many people complaining about that. Maybe thiers was sealed but not mine. Disapointed customer!
customer_reviews.author: RandomPerson

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage that does not make you feel greasy or caked on.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Urban Decay for years, but it is so expensive. This product kept popping up on my Amazon feed and I saw how expensive it was and what great feedback people were providing. So I guessed my color and tried it out. Overall, this product is excellent. I feel like it provides a cleaner coverage on the face and is much less greasy than Urban Decay. For those of you who are worried about finding your color fit online, try narrowing down the colors to ones you have purchased for other brands. Then, chose from that smaller group.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Whicher

customer_reviews.title: Oxidizes Too Much
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to find makeup light enough with the right undertone for years now. 102 Fair Porcelain looked like it might be a match, but it dries down pretty dark and orangey for me. I wish it came in a few shades lighter. If not for the color I think I'd really like it. It seems to cover my pores nicely and doesn't settle into fine lines. I only used a tiny bit where I felt I needed it rather than my entire face. My skin is fairly dry with dry patches but with enough moisturizer the texture looks fine. Though I did use it more like a concealer than a foundation. Unfortunately it's just oxidizes too much.
customer_reviews.author: SuperSquish

customer_reviews.title: GENIUS PACKAGING! You can get it all!
customer_reviews.text: I love the make up itself but what I love most: FINALLY somebody who has the packaging figured out!!! I'm so done with stupid, bulky glass bottles with which you waste 1/4 of the content. Some of them even come without a pump or an applicator so you can't get anything out unless you shake it and hit it until you have too much. I always preferred plastic containers as I can cut them in two halves and use the rest that I couldn't get out before (which then usually lasted me another 2 weeks). So this packaging is genius! It's squeezable! It's probably lighter on the environment, too.
customer_reviews.author: RxBxCCx

customer_reviews.title: Left White Dots in My Pores
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful water-based foundation. I tried it with and without Maybelline Master Primer. It is so pretty I was really hoping I could wear it. Unfortunately, with and without the primer it settled in my pores and left white dots in my pores. I tried applying it with both a Beauty Blender and foundation brush but had the same disappointing results. Evidently this makeup doesn’t work with my skin so I’ll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Ickyrode

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite foundation!
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation! I’ve tried a ton of them over the years including high end brands. Clinique was the best I’d found until I tried this. Great colors, #112 matches my skin perfectly. My skin has been getting less oily lately so I thought I might need the “FIT Dewy and smooth” but the “FIT Matte &Poreless has been just perfect. It goes on smoothly., not too heavy, not too light. And even better that it’s a great price! I should add that I always use a primer before I put on foundation. And I do like Maybelline Master prime as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sher Bear

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 14-year-old because she was out of foundation, the price is the same as that of her normal brand, I could have it shipped quickly, and I typically have good luck with Maybelline products. Overall, the quality is decent for the price. The color was as expected and it had fairly good coverage. My daughter likes it fine, but she prefers her other brand foundation because she said it covers and blends better. Since I can't have that one shipped because it's exclusive to the store it comes from, I'll still be purchasing this when it's more convenient than going to the store. Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mel B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice foundation that not only matches my skin tone very well, but is helping dramatically with some skin issues I’m having. Some meds I’m taking are messing with my hormones, and my face has been extremely oily in places and dry and flaky in others as a result. Switching to this foundation has had a dramatic effect. It’s not only reduced the appearance of the oily / dry areas, but also helped to reduce how oily / dry those areas are. On top of that, it does a great job concealing imperfections (in concert with concealer and powder).
customer_reviews.author: Seoh

customer_reviews.title: Empty bottle
customer_reviews.text: I just got my product and it's less than the half of the bottle, so disappointed ! (The foundation is good to my skin, color fits me pretty nice, I only tested a little with the rest of the product left in the bottle)
customer_reviews.author: Ana Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage, hides all imperfections
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price, covers acne scars and large pores. Very light not heavy, does not look like wearing cover up at all. Super skin tone match
customer_reviews.author: Reading Genie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this foundation! I always like trying new products. I’ve been using Physicians Formula for years. This is similar, nice and lightweight but provides better coverage. Does not leave creases under eye or around mouth - which at least for me, is hard to find. Spreads nice and easy! This will be my new go-to during the spring and summer. I’ll likely switch to something a bit more hydrating during the winter months. You can’t beat the price. I ordered 120 and 122 and both are great for my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Cherish O.

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a shade for my palesness!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my 8th or 9th bottle of this foundation (style not shade). It is so cheap (affordability not quality) that I can buy 3 to 4 of them and still pay less than department store prices. I've been able to experiment with different shades to find the best "Fit" for my skin tone. I use fake tan a lot too so I always keep light and dark shades in my makeup bag. I'm super pale. like you can see my veins pale and every foundation I get is always too dark even though it's their lightest shade.. but I found a shade that finally fits my palesness! It's a great foundation and super inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: The finish is so smooth and perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I have REALLY oily skin so I always go for a matte foundation. This one gives good coverage while still looking natural, in that it doesn't look cakey and like I'm wearing lots of foundation. It makes pores disappear. I still get oily and have to blot my face regularly, but then the oil my skin produces is insane, you could run a small town on the oil I produce. Application with either a sponge or brush, both work really well. I prefer this specific foundation to all the others I've tried, so much so that now this is the only one I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My drugstore favorite
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this foundation for years, and it’s what I used on clients too when I was freelancing as a makeup artist. The color range is true to many skintones and the formulas are blendable, buildable, and wear well when set with powder and fixing spray. There is no flashback either. This formula, the Matte + Poreless, has more of a modern natural matte finish, meaning it’s not flat powdery matte like from the 90’s. It’s not shiny but not flat either, it maintains some dimension (though you’ll still want to do light contour and blush). I will keep buying this as long as they keep making it! It’s on my Subscribe & Save auto-order list.
customer_reviews.author: TXLA

customer_reviews.title: Only foundation I've found so far that is my actual skin color
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pale I've never been able to find foundation that fits my skin color- everything in the store looked way too dark. This was actually my first time buying foundation because this was the first time I thought it would be even close to my skin tone and it's perfect! If you have super pale skin with neutral undertones like me, you know the pain of makeup always being too red or too orange! I am so glad to have found this gem and I was worried about getting foundation online but this is absolutely my color.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: broke my skin out
customer_reviews.text: So, by reading the reviews, it was a 50/50 buy. It was like everyone used a different foundation lol. Everything from "spreads like concrete" to "runny". Wtf. Mine felt like normal foundation consistency. However, i didn't receive the color i ordered. I assuming the Amazon gods felt i was more ivory than porcelain. Either way, It broke my skin out terribley in my jaw line, nose, and neck. Rather bummed out. Ill return to Neutrogena I suppose. Hope this helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: HESS_NC

customer_reviews.title: Not as Great as I Had Hoped.
customer_reviews.text: The foundation goes on smoothly and most of it lasts the entire day, but it wasn’t as “matte” as I wanted it to be. Some of it had worn off by the end of the day, especially on my nose. I had high hopes for this foundation, but I was left with nothing more than an “It’ll do” feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Matched perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I’m already a fan of this product. I have oily skin and some foundation makes it worse. This stays in place and doesn’t make me look shiny. Super plus in my book. On top of that I have tried tons of expensive foundation and I like this best so even better. I am always afraid to buy make up on here, but had some schedule issues and didn’t have a choice. I had a little left over and it matched it perfectly. Consistency was the same and so was the color and it came the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Love to read

customer_reviews.title: Great products just having trouble finding my skin
customer_reviews.text: I thought it matched but when i asked a freind they said it looks super dark i looked like a burn victim Great foundation just disaponted that thisthe sixth time i have brought foundation either too dark or too light i give up .im just going to.continue using the black radiance bb cream in (honey amber) At least that LOOKs 100% natural and looks just like skin . im just relizing foundation isnt meant for me. Its annoying trying 20 diffrenct foundations just to find none of them match lol and I'm brown skin
customer_reviews.author: exotic

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Most Expensive Brands
customer_reviews.text: I have cystic acne plus scarring and rosacea. The liquid foundation helps to cover those areas. This foundation can hold its own against the more expensive competitors. I have tried many different foundations and bought this as I was going through some financial hardships and couldn't afford anything else. I was pleasantly surprised. I plan on using this even after my financial hardships have passed. It lasts a while too. Drug store makeup for the win!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Best Foundation Out There!
customer_reviews.text: Growing up , i’ve had terrible acne. I spent years trying to find a foundation & powder that wouldn’t make my skin to break out. After searching for awhile , i stumbled upon the Fit Me makeup line. This is perfect for people with sensitive skin! It’s got great coverage & doesn’t dry up fast! Its truly a miracle , lol. Highly recommend all of Fit Me products!
customer_reviews.author: Necia

customer_reviews.title: my go to
customer_reviews.text: this is my go to foundation. i wear this daily. use my dry beauty blender and go to work to beat my face. i only use maybelline foundations because they don't irritate my skin or give me acne! this is a nice coverage, you can do one layer for nice natural look or pack it on for a more full coverage look. But great price same as walmart, drug stores are a bit more expensive so amazon is always a great alternative to save a few bucks. same quality as if purchased in store. will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie F.

customer_reviews.title: Shades 110-120
customer_reviews.text: So I bought 110-120 shades. I’m more pink so the Ivory ones work better then the straight brown shade ones, I would suggest to buy at least 4 if you trying to find your shade, at $5 a pop I say it’s worth it to find the right one. Plus you will have some when you tan a little or if you look a little lighter bc maybe health reasons. My pic has 112 Natural Ivory. The 115 works too. I’m also getting 1120 classic ivory for if I get a few shades of color. I live in TX after all 😂
customer_reviews.author: anna davis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light coverage.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good foundation for such an affordable price point. Very light spreadable coverage, but it still provides a nice cover that you can see. I like that it doesn't feel heavy at all. It was also pretty easy to guess a color that would work for me- which can sometimes be the hardest part. It really takes any unevenness or redness out of my face. It also leaves a nice powder finish to the touch that I really like. I have used dozens of more expensive products with less impressive results. I plan to continue to keep some of this on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon J

customer_reviews.title: Great Foundation for Oily Skin
customer_reviews.text: Great foundation! I have pretty oily skin and follow a pretty basic skin care routine and I tried on some foundation a couple of hours after the routine and it looked fine without any primer. I’ve tried on much more expensive foundations before and often have the issue of it looking cakey but this one was relatively fine, (still just slightly cakey but much less so then any other foundations I’ve tried.) I tend to stick to powder foundations but I really like this one and think I’ll definitely be using it more often. Overall, it’s better then some of the $30+ foundations I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Aine

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $!
customer_reviews.text: I had always been a full coverage foundation kind of girl but decided I wanted to give something else a shot. I came across this product on YouTube from a few influencers who raved on it, and decided for the price point to give it a shot. I am super happy with this product in terms of how flawless it goes on and how long it lasts. I did just purchase my second bottle of it and did find it was a little thinner than the first, but has made no difference in the coverage. I will definitely continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I was using the Fit Me Matte foundation stick for the convenience but decided to try the liquid because I read lots of good thing about it. It really works so well - good coverage (I don't need full coverage, just enough to even out skin tone) and blends like a dream. It does seem to go on a bit darker than the stick, however, which is strange. I just started using a flat top brush to blend and it works beautifully and I didn't have to use as much. Definitely try it but I wound recommend going to the store to check out the shades - beware of your skin's undertone and match it accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. K.

customer_reviews.title: Not what i like
customer_reviews.text: I expected something more from americas #1 foundation makeup. I am not impressed by it at all. It does not cover flawlesy, and it feels really dry after a. Few hours. I hate the spin off lid and the pore it contailer, cuz i lose things like lids and pouring is messy. I dont put this on and think wow!! I put it on think what? And why? Oh well, better luck next time, go n buy some Maybelline.
customer_reviews.author: Drip it or drop it

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Works great and you can't beat the value! I tried out an EXPENSIVE designer brand (Benefit) out of curiosity, and it wasn't half as good as this product. It's perfect for me. Still need to blot excess oil now and then, but that's normal, and this liquid foundation doesn't cake or crease. It looks great day to night. I do use finishing powder or a dusting of Matte & Poreless mineral powder and setting spray.
customer_reviews.author: Levi & Amber Burlison

customer_reviews.title: Great for me
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is fairly priced and matches my skin tone perfectly. I live in the Caribbean and this makeup is still breathable on a hot, summer day. It is light and last long.
customer_reviews.author: Lerenda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect texture without sticky effect
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. Despite low price it overcame my expectations. It has a very soft texture and as if with powder in it. Covers face very smoothly without leaving any spots or uncovered areas. It is very matte, without oily effect. Skin is absolutely non sticky. I wear it the whole day and it remains fresh looking all the time. I recommend this product for sure. I can tell that i tried expensive brand foundations, chanel lancome dior etc. This one is a great alternative!
customer_reviews.author: Jalil Khalilov

customer_reviews.title: YUCK!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful!!!! I have used it in the past and it wasn’t so bad, but I don’t know if the formula has changed, or what, but this is just bad!!! I have normal to slightly oily skin. My skin is mostly clear all the time, and upon priming my skin, this foundation does NOT stay in place. Plus the color is awful. I’m fair with pink undertones, and this color is just sickly looking. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Wow, IT MATCHES MY SKIN
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I just put this on my skin and it matches perfectly! I just smudged it with my finger no brush or sponge but wow! I was about to pay $70 for the same size bottle of foundation! I’m happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Foxxyness

customer_reviews.title: It's just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I read so many good reviews on this base so I was excited to try it. It was pretty watery going on. It was easy to spread and looked good at first. But a few minutes later I looked in the mirror and it looked like I had painted every pour with it. I really don't understand why it will do that to some people and not to other. So I guess you'd have to try it to know. It's a great price so even if it don't work for you you won't be out much because it's just over 5 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this makeup blends so well with my skin tone.. I don't usually wear makeup but I wanted to try it out to cover a few acne scars on my face and it works great. I see why it has so many great reviews. I found my shade by looking at the comments with pictures. I saw a young lady with the same skin tone as mine and luckily for me, she posted the shade that she purchased.
customer_reviews.author: LovelyLachon

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGING
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t like spending a lot of money on makeup so when I saw the crazy amount of positive views on this foundation, I was very interested. OMG it is the best foundation I’ve ever used. It goes on so smooth and dries with a perfect matte finish. It’s not sticky or smudge-y like other products I’ve used. I will never use another foundation again. And the color matches perfectly. Soooo in love with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect smooth blend!!!
customer_reviews.text: It blends perfectly with my skin after maybelline matched me perfectly with the color 355 coconut. You could not tell that I had on any makeup. Unfortunately I have sensitive skin and it broke me out. So I will be returning it other than that I would have kept it. It goes on so smooth and blends perfectly. BUT my only downside was as soon as it dried it looked flaky. I’m new to makeup so I’m sure there is probably a way to keep it from looking flaky. I would have kept it but I’m allergic. Enjoyed it for the 20mins it was on!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Pooh

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but great quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m shocked that I ordered online based on the colors shown and the shade actually matches perfectly. I’m half Asian so my skin tone is hard to match, most are either too pink or wash me out. I was going to try a more expensive foundation but decided to get this first because of the good reviews and super affordability.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Haskell

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is a definite money saver. After years of buying more expensive brands costing $40+ I was introduced to store brand makeup. Unfortunately they don't usually carry my dark skin tone complexion match in the stores. So i was presently surprised that amazon carried all the different shades and so much cheaper than what i used to buy. This matched me perfectly. I have super oily skin. This doesnt stay matte too long but just as long as the more expensive brands. My only con would be that i wish it came with a pump because when i pour it sometimes too much product comes out. I wear Mocha
customer_reviews.author: Missy2beTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It's okay...it doesn't last long before it flakes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this foundation based off reviews that says it's awesome. Not for me, I guess. It did include my skin tone, which is nice because I'm usually too pale for many products. It also dries quickly upon application. But it cracks terribly along the lines of my mouth, under-eyes, and above my eyebrows whenever I make expressions or move my face. And eventually, it flakes off. I'm not sure if it's because I have dry skin, but I make a point to exfoliate and moisturize my skin before I put on foundation and it doesn't help. It's not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pettersson

customer_reviews.title: Alternative To MAC
customer_reviews.text: I was almost out of foundation and I just really didn’t have the funds to buy more MAC. I checked online to see which Maybelline Fit Me foundation was comparable to my MAC number. I ordered this and it’s really almost an exact match at a much lower cost. For me, it’s not quite as good as my MAC, but that’s a fair trade-off to save so much money. I think this is a great go-to foundation for any lady and I’ll definitely be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Zurcher

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I never used this before and just wanted to try something light for the summer and with full coverage! This one provides both! I am also surprised that the color on the website is exactly what it looks like when I received the 2 bottles. Absolutely love the matte effect as well because you don’t really need a powder over it... covers everything! It’s inexpensive and you get 2 full sized bottles! ❤️🙏🏾👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: BBAISSE

customer_reviews.title: Long wear, good for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: This has been the only drugstore foundation that has qualified for me regular use rotation. It works well for my oily skin, holds up for ~8 hours. A good full coverage that can be built up even more on spots for compete coverage. I appreciate that this works well with a brush or sponge. Doesn’t last the 12 hours that I get from my high-end fave but good for day to day use. What a great find! Just wish it had a pump!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Jean

customer_reviews.title: works perfect in winter, not in summer
customer_reviews.text: is my second time using this foundation and the first time thought was amazing but was winter, now in summer my face turn so shine, and after a while start to come out, so i wouldn’t recommend for summer, but in winter works perfect
customer_reviews.author: sofia

customer_reviews.title: Just As Good As Kat Von D
customer_reviews.text: You defiantly need to moisturize before using this product. It also makes it last longer if applied to a base. I would say this is just as good as Kat Von D. I use to buy only Kat Von D foundation and I switched to this foundation. I honestly think it is just as good and last longer. I get the fairest color and I got the second fairest of Kat Von D.
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Oxidized on my skin
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the Natural Beige color. I did not like this. It turned orange on me and splotchy. I am 50 and have fair, combination skin with oily t-zone and reddish tone due to sun damage. I don't know if the product was old or it just did not agree with my particular skin. I returned. Note: I also ordered in True Beige and that color was a little better for my skin tone and wore a little better, but not enough for me to use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. MI

customer_reviews.title: Too thin to make a difference
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me, you like a good coverage without drying out the youth out of your skin. You like matte powerful coverage with still some shine. Nope. This ain’t it. This is like too thin to spread evenly, little to no coverage. Watered down foundation that you can also find at drugstores. Drugstore doesn’t mean bad automatically because I have found many gems in the pharmacies in NYC but this just ain’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Jones

customer_reviews.title: My favorite foundation for my oily acne prone skin!
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for my oily skin! It absorbs the excess oil upon application & is very easy to apply. Additionally, I don't break out at all, which isn't the case with other foundations. I've been loyal to this foundation since it came out, that's how much I love it. The only drawback for me is that it does come off more easily than I would like, such as under my fingernails if I scratch my face or around my nose area if I blow my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Virgo43

customer_reviews.title: I don’t feel caked in make up
customer_reviews.text: I don’t feel caked in make up and it is actually light enough for me, I usually can’t find anything light enough to not look like crap Bc it’s too dark.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Elkins

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. I have olive skin and a little redness and bought 128 and it’s PERFECT. I absolutely recommend this foundation. I love it more than Tarte, Julia’s Place and others. It’s a medium/full coverage which means it’s buildable and it blends beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: ble

customer_reviews.title: This stuff made me fall in love with Liquid Foundation
customer_reviews.text: I've hated liquid foundation for years.i've never been able to use it because my combo skin either sucks it all up and it ends up flaking off or it turns me into a grease bucket. This foundation doesn't do either. I can wear it all day with minimal transfer. My T-zone isn't near as oily and my dry patches aren't visibly noticeable. Overall I am beyond impressed and you cannot beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth formula!
customer_reviews.text: This formula really does make you look flawless! It’s a pretty light to medium coverage, but it lasts a long time and is easily blendable! I wear blush, highlighter and bronzer over it and it works well! It gives a very even coverage overall. I applied with a brush and then tapped it in with a beauty blender. Great thing is, this formula does not smell bad at all!
customer_reviews.author: Mariash Dopey

customer_reviews.title: Lightest foundation ive tried so far
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I could do a liquid foundation and have always worked with mineralized or Stick foundation. Tried this one, and was easy to use, had less to no strokes while applying, since i ordered it online, got the shade a bit lighter than my skin, but can work with it. The foundation i light, makes you feel like you don't have foundation on, lasted a good while...
customer_reviews.author: shakyas

customer_reviews.title: Great moderate coverage foundation
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally wear foundation (I stick to tinted moisturizers) but wanted something with more coverage and photoready for my brother's wedding. I was really pleased with how this applied and stayed on throughout the day without any touching up. I was able to look at it in Target to get the right color and it blended well with my skin. It provided moderate coverage for me but was light and didn't feel cakey. It stayed matte (I covered with Maybelling powder as well) and didn't rub off on anyone that I hugged. I will definitely use this for days when I need a little more than my tinted moisturizer can give me!
customer_reviews.author: K. WyattTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The only foundation I will use!
customer_reviews.text: I love my fit me foundation! Like that’s my jam! I will not use any other foundation unless it’s fit me 356 liquid foundation! So boom! Just make sure you don’t over moisturize your face before the foundation or you’ll look shiny but it’s a win for me loves!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Best drugstore liquid foundation hands down
customer_reviews.text: I originally started using this product when I had run out of my Smashbox liquid foundation and didn't want to splurge for a new one. Well, turns out I actually love this Maybelline foundation even more! I have fairly oily skin as well as some old acne scars. I use a primer with this foundation and I'm barely even starting to shine by the end of a full work day (9+ hours). It also covers my scarring/marks extremely well. Love love this foundation and for less than $6 you just can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Out of all of the drug store foundations I have tried through the years, this is my favorite. It moisturizes well, comes in a nice range of colors, provides a matte finish, layers well without being cakey and is affordable. It’s not perfect in that it doesn’t work well with all spf moisturizers, and it does not wear as long as other days in our Texas heat as I would prefer, BUT, it is still a great buy and gives you bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Tracy Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding makeup!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but I read many reviews stating what great coverage this make up provides. I love it! It really does improve the appearance of my skin and stays on all day. I even went to the dentist one afternoon, had water sprayed all over my face, had to wipe down around my mouth, and the make up stayed on to the point that I didn't have to touch up and could go right back to work. It is LIGHT, so even though I am very fair, the Porcelain color was way too light. I went with the Natural Ivory in a different purchase, and it is great. I probably even could have tried the shade above that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: This updated pouch version is a little different than the original matte and porless. The added ingredient of the clay helps with oily skin. I’ve used the original matte and porless for a couple of years and compared to other foundations I loved it except it wasn’t that matte and in 2 hours my oils peaked through and that’s my only complaint about it. The consistency and the shade is still the same but when it comes to my oily skin, it helped control the oils a lot longer than the other one and it works well in the heat! This one I’ll continue to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nel madrigal

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation. I was spending $$$$ on the prestige ...
customer_reviews.text: Best foundation. I was spending $$$$ on the prestige brands . Even though the prestige brands are good, this is JUST as good for a fraction of the cost. Seriously cannot tell the difference when I wear this or Chanel Les Beiges, Tarte Amazonian Clay, MAC, etc. I was skeptical but as soon as I tried it I loved it. Does not cause irritation. Works well to keep oil at bay but I suggest blotting and powder throughout the day. Does not oxidize. No flashback.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Good for casual wear
customer_reviews.text: Generally a good foundation for casual use, this one does oxidize so keep that in mind, very hard to choose the color online as well, I am very light but 110 Porcelain seems to be just so much lighter, I chose based on a more natural yellow undertone instead of the pink ones and it's kind of in the middle, very very light color tho, good thing is you can mix them to match whatever tone the sun has got you looking.
customer_reviews.author: Sirius Black

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Very light coverage, not really buildable but the color match is pretty good considering I didn't know what I was getting but I chose Warm Nude.. It's okay for Mon-Fri sitting in an Office.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for when you're traveling because it takes so much less space than a traditional glass foundation bottle. This would also be great for makeup artists who are also typically limited in space for their kits.
customer_reviews.author: Xandros

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and looks good
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this from Walgreens but it’s actually like $3-5 cheaper on amazon so this is where I will continue to purchase it. But I wear this everyday and it matches my skin tone perfectly. I will say that it does rub off during the day sometimes but what foundation doesn’t when you run your face throughout the day? Overall I really like this product and I love the price point even more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All I use is cover girl and so far, this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several of the cover girl foundations. This one is my favorite so far. It's light on your face and not thick or heavy. It's matte so it doesn't make your face shine. It's really good if you have sensitive skin.... I do. It's a lot like the cover girl clean which is also matte and oil free. I think I like this one even better. Really good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Better than dewy and smooth
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the dewy and smooth formula for a very long time since I have combination skin. I had always thought that this version would dry out my skin so fast in the winter. Boy, was I wrong. If anything, the dewy and smooth one dried out my skin worse than this one. It applies perfectly with a sponge and blends effortlessly. It generally lasts me all day, but I wouldn't sleep in it, even by accident. It will get on your pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Emily McKeon

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my skin. I've seen mixed reviews and was worried I would break out or something but gave it a try anyway. I gotta say...it's probably my favorite foundation yet ....light but good coverage, evens out my skin tone and blurs imperfections just as it says without feeling heavy. I bought in creamy beige and natural beige. Only used creamy beige so far and it's perfect for my skin tone. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: L. Petric

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is a good foundation. The color is very close to my skin color even when I was leery on ordering without comparing to my skin in person. I only rated it a 4 because it could be a little smoother to blend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, not durable
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay foundation, it does cover imperfections and it's easy to spread, but whenever something touches my face part of the foundation goes with it, on my clothes, napkin, everywhere. I use it when I'm going somewhere quick, I wouldn't use it if I had to have it for a long period.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever Makeup
customer_reviews.text: Maybelline always has and always will have great products. This makeup is light to wear and blends very well. It does not make your skin look oily by the end of the day. I love the fact that there are many different shades. Everyone can find theirs. I buy a winter and summer shade. Love them both. I am 64 years old and it is a wonderful product with a great price
customer_reviews.author: Merilyn Perry

customer_reviews.title: Hard to wash off
customer_reviews.text: I don’t love this foundation. It looks fake on my face and not in a good way. It doesn’t blend well and leaves my skin looking dry. It is so hard to wash off at the end of the day. I won’t be repurchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony James

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hit!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a liquid foundation, only pressed powered. But as I’m getting older (just turned 46), my pores have become more visible with pressed powered. So I got a recommendation from someone on YouTube and bought this liquid foundation to try...yeah!!!!! I got the right shade and it was easy to apply. So happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Clinique foundation and started to notice a change in the makeup. I decided to try this liquid foundation and I’m so happy I did! This product is fantastic! I like the coverage much better and color 118 is a perfect match for me. This is a light formula that provides the right coverage. Give it a try like I did. It’s a great foundation!
customer_reviews.author: Au! Stupido!!

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation for me
customer_reviews.text: The reason I really like this foundation and keep coming back to it is- easy to apply, goes on smoothly & dries to a matte finish. does not cake or settle into fine lines. stays on even in humidity. medium to full coverage without feeling heavy. does not cause irritation. the color once you find a match is as close to perfect as a makeup artist could match you with. I use the Nude Beige in both liquid foundation and also powder foundation to 'set' my makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Cat LadyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the only foundation that doesn't make my skin look greasy by the end of the day, or settle in my pores and look uneven. I'm on my 3rd bottle and I haven't been disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S

customer_reviews.title: Nice makeup, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's just me, but I find buying foundation online to almost always be a disaster. The makeup looks different in person than in the pic. I have spent so much money on my quest to find the right shade. This one was too dark for me, so I will be applying it with a lighter shade to (hopefully) find the right coverage.
customer_reviews.author: LadyG

customer_reviews.title: My new daily foundation!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much from this foundation because of the price, but wow I am so impressed! The consistency is excellent—it goes on smoothly and leaves my face truly matte and poreless. I do wish it had a better top, because I pour out more than I would like sometimes, but overall I can’t complain because of the formula and affordability.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jamie

customer_reviews.title: It was ok, but...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was alright. I have oily acne prone skin and I did not think it gave me full coverage. If you want a more natural look, this may work. I also did not find it to be very matte and it rubbed off rather easily. I mean it was an ok foundation, but I definitely would not suggest it to others with the same skin type as me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MAC no more!
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is better than anything I’ve tried, and I try EVERYTHING! It blends easily, leaves a beautiful finish, no cracking or color change throughout the day. It’s gorgeous and covers everything without looking like I’m wearing a ton of makeup. Love it and bye bye MAC Studio Fix in NC20. Fit Me Shade 128 is what I should have been wearing years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Danziger

customer_reviews.title: Ehh half gone and smells bad.
customer_reviews.text: When I received my foundation I noticed that the bottle looks almost gone. There was no leaking in my package so that leaves me to wonder where the product went. Upon taking the lid off I instantly noticed the smell. It doesn’t smell like any other foundation from this brand. Safe to say I won’t be using it which is a shame since finding my shade in store is very hard. I’m not sure if the product is expired, oxidized or what.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea m

product_meta.title: Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Liquid Foundation Makeup, Natural Ivory, 2 COUNT Oil-Free Foundation
product_meta.description:
Color:112 NATURAL IVORY| Size:2 Count Bottle 1 fl oz.Maybelline Makeup Fit Me Matte + Poreless Liquid Foundation Makeup. Apply foundation onto skin and blend with fingertips or an applicator. America’s #1 Foundation*
*L’Oreal calculation based on data reported by Nielsen through its Scantrack Service for the Foundation category for the 52-week period ending February 9, 2019, for the US xAOC market according to L’Oreal’s custom product hierarchy. The Nielsen Company.
feature_bullets: MAYBELLINE FIT ME MATTE FOUNDATION: For a natural looking medium coverage liquid foundation makeup, look no further. In 40 shades, you'll find a fit for every skin tone. Best for normal to oily skin; refines pores for a natural looking matte finish.

A SHADE THAT FITS ME: Maybelline Fit Me liquid foundation provides coverage for a wide array of skin tones, from Ivory to Mocha. Use as a full face foundation with buildable coverage for a flawless, natural-looking, "I woke up like this" finish.

MAYBELLINE FIT ME FOR A FLAWLESS FACE: With Matte + Poreless foundation or Dewy+ Smooth foundation with SPF 18, concealer, finishing powder, bronzer & blush, Maybelline New York Fit Me collection has everything you need to put your best face forward.

MAYBELLINE HAS WHAT YOU NEED to create any look--foundation, bb creams, concealers & highlighters to create a perfect canvas, eyeshadows, brow pencils & eyeliners for any eye look & lip products, from showstopping matte lipstick to au natural lip balms.
REMOVE MAYBELLINE MAKEUP WITH MICELLAR WATER: Use Garnier Micellar Water as a gentle makeup remover at night, and as a facial cleanser in the morning to prep skin for Maybelline makeup.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
